RegionalSpecialty.Prompt: Is the item 18th level or higher?

WardMedic.Note: Cuando usas Tratar enfermedad o Tratar heridas, puedes tratar hasta dos objetivos. Si eres un maestro en Medicina, podrás tratar hasta cuatro objetivos, y si eres legendario, podrás tratar hasta ocho objetivos.

WardingRune.Prompt: Seleccione una escuela de magia distinta de la adivinación.

GriefsFury.Toggle: Grief's Fury — Target dealt damage to your bonded partner

Wayang.ShadowOfTheCourtier: Once per day, if you fail, but not critically fail, a check to Make an Impression, you can play it off as part of a performance, allowing you to reroll the check; this is a fortune effect.

WellspringMage.CriticalSuccess: Recuperas temporalmente un espacio de conjuro gastado de cualquier rango de tu elección. El espacio de conjuro temporal dura 1 minuto y, si no lo usas para entonces, experimentas un @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.rollable-tables.RollTable.N0pDFNCffTe2Du39]{Wellspring Surge} inmediato.
WellspringMage.Failure: Generas un @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.rollable-tables.RollTable.N0pDFNCffTe2Du39]{Wellspring Surge} , con un rango de hechizo elegido aleatoriamente entre tus tres rangos principales de espacios para hechizos (o todos tus rangos si tienes menos de tres)
WellspringMage.Initiative: Cuando tiras iniciativa para un encuentro de combate no trivial, así como en otras situaciones de alto estrés elegidas por el DJ, la magia brota dentro de ti. Intente un @Check[type:flat|dc:6|traits:wellspring-magic] .
WellspringMage.Success: Recuperas temporalmente un espacio de hechizo gastado de un rango de hechizo elegido al azar entre tus tres rangos superiores de espacios de hechizo (o todos tus rangos de espacios de hechizo si tienes menos de tres). El espacio dura 3 rondas en lugar de 1 minuto; de lo contrario, experimentarás un @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.rollable-tables.RollTable.N0pDFNCffTe2Du39]{Wellspring Surge}.

Werebat.Description: You gain a 10ft speed and a 15ft fly speed, and a 1d8 piercing fangs unarmed attack. When Flying due to the fly speed granted by this form, you must begin and end your movement on a solid surface or immediately fall.
Werebat.Label: Werebat

Werebear.Description: You gain a 25ft speed, a 1d8 piercing jaws unarmed attack, and a 1d6 slashing claw unarmed attack with the agile trait.
Werebear.Label: Werebear

Wereboar.Description: You gain a 30ft speed, and a 1d8 slashing tusk unarmed attack with the sweep trait.
Wereboar.Label: Wereboar

Werecrocodile.Description: You gain a 25ft speed and a 15ft swim speed, and a 1d8 piercing jaws unarmed attack with the grapple trait. You can hold your breath for 2 hours in animal or hybrid form.
Werecrocodile.Label: Werecrocodile

Weremoose.Description: You gain a 25ft speed, and a 1d8 piercing antler unarmed attack with the shove trait.
Weremoose.Label: Weremoose

Wererat.Description: You gain a 25ft speed, a 1d6 piercing jaws unarmed attack with the finesse trait, and a 1d4 slashing claw unarmed attack with the agile and finesse traits. Your animal shape is Small in size.
Wererat.Label: Wererat

Wereshark.Description: You gain a 15ft speed and a 25ft swim speed, and a 1d8 piercing jaws unarmed attack with the grapple trait. Your hybrid shape gains the amphibious swim 25 feet trait. In your animal shape, you lose your land Speed and your Swim speed increases to 35 feet, and you gain the aquatic trait.
Wereshark.Label: Wereshark

Weretiger.Description: You gain a 25ft speed, a 1d8 piercing jaws unarmed attack, and a 1d6 slashing claw unarmed attack with the agile trait.
Weretiger.Label: Weretiger

Werewolf.Description: You gain a 30ft speed, and a 1d8 piercing jaws unarmed attack with the trip trait.
Werewolf.Label: Werewolf

YouDontSmellRight.Label: Seek to determine if a creature is disguised

BalancedLuck.Description: Cuando Lanzas o Mantienes un maleficio, puedes elegir para una criatura a 15 pies (4,5 m) o menos de tu familiar entre un bonificador +1 por estatus a su CA o un penalizador -1 por estatus a su CA hasta el final de tu siguiente turno.
BalancedLuck.Title: Familiar de suerte equilibrada

FlowingScript.Description: Cuando Lanzas o Mantienes un maleficio, las letras empiezan a cambiar rápidamente, causando una distracción. Hasta el final de tu siguiente turno, tu familiar puede proporcionarte flanqueo a ti y a tus aliados como si fuera capaz de atacar y tuviera un alcance de 5 pies (1,5 m); éste es un efecto visual.
FlowingScript.Title: Familiar de escritura fluida

FreezingRime.Description: Cuando Lanzas o Mantienes un maleficio, puedes hacer que se forme hielo en una @Template[burst|distance:5]{explosión de 5 pies (1,5 m)} centrada en una casilla del espacio de tu familiar. Dichas casillas son terreno difícil hasta el inicio de tu siguiente turno.
FreezingRime.Title: Familiar de escarcha congeladora

KeenSenses.Description: Cuando Lanzas o Mantienes un maleficio, tu familiar obtiene un sentido impreciso como olfato, sentido de la vibración o sentido de las olas, con un rango de distancia de 60 pies (18 m) hasta el inicio de tu siguiente turno y puede @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.sn2hIy1iIJX9Vpgj]{Señalar} de inmediato como una acción gratuita.
KeenSenses.Title: Familiar de sentidos agudos

NimbleFlight.Description: When you Cast or Sustain a hex, your familiar can Fly up to 15 feet; this movement doesn't trigger reactions.
NimbleFlight.Title: Familiar of Nimble Flight

OngoingMisery.Description: Cuando Lanzas o Mantienes un maleficio, tu familiar puede maldecir a una criatura a 15 pies (4,5 m) o menos de él, prolongando en 1 asalto la duración de cualquier estado negativo que le afecta. Éste es un efecto de maldición, que prolonga sólo estados con una duración mesurable en el tiempo (como por ejemplo "1 asalto" o "hasta el final de tu siguiente turno") y no evita que los estados se puedan eliminar de otra forma.
OngoingMisery.Title: Familiar de tristeza continuada

OverwhelmingTides.Description: When you Cast or Sustain a hex, you can cause a small wave to surge forth from your familiar. One creature within 10 feet of your familiar is pushed 5 feet away from your familiar.
OverwhelmingTides.Title: Familiar of Overwhelming Tides

ParasiticMight.Description: When you Cast or Sustain a hex, one creature within 15 feet of your familiar with less than half of its maximum Hit Points becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Indispuesto 1} unless it succeeds at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.system.attributes.spellDC.value)] saving throw.
ParasiticMight.Title: Familiar of Parasitic Might

RestoredSpirit.Description:
Cuando Lanzas o Mantienes un maleficio, una criatura voluntaria a 15 pies (4,5 m) o menos de tu familiar obtiene tantos Puntos de
Golpe temporales como 2 + la mitad de tu nivel, que duran hasta el final de tu siguiente turno.
RestoredSpirit.Title: Familiar del espíritu restablecido

StalkingNight.Description: Cuando Lanzas o Mantienes un maleficio y tu familiar está adyacente a un enemigo del que no está @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Oculto}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Escondido} o no detectado,  el enemigo queda @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Asustado 1}.
StalkingNight.Title: Familiar de la noche acechante

BolsteringAid.Description: Your familiar knows all manner of tricks that can help! When you Cast or Sustain a hex, and your familiar is adjacent to an ally, that ally gains a +2 status bonus to the next non-attack skill check that ally attempts before the start of your next turn.
BolsteringAid.Title: Familiar of Bolstering Aid

EnticingNegotiation.Description: When you Cast or Sustain a hex and your familiar is within 10 feet of an enemy, the enemy becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} until the start of your next turn. Your familiar can only distract a single enemy per round in this way.
EnticingNegotiation.Title: Familiar of Enticing Negotiation

ObscuringSnowfall.Description: When you Cast or Sustain a hex, you can cause clinging snow to fall in a @Template[type:burst|distance:5] centered on a square of your familiar's space. This snowfall remains until the start of your next turn, and enemies that enter these squares during that period are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled} until the start of your next turn.
ObscuringSnowfall.Title: Familiar of Obscuring Snowfall

PairedPerplexity.Description: When you Cast or Sustain a hex, your familiar seems to double and be in two places at once. One creature you choose within 20 feet of it is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 1} until the start of your next turn; this is a visual effect.
PairedPerplexity.Title: Familiar of Paired Perplexity

SwarmsHeart.Description: When you Cast or Sustain a hex, the insects swarm to protect you and your allies. Until the start of your next turn, your familiar grants concealment to you or any ally while sharing the same space.
SwarmsHeart.Title: Familiar of Swarm's Heart

Seneschal.AdjustmentsAddendum: Instead of your patron's lesson, you gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.IqBfoUaWDennHYoZ]{Manifest Will} hex cantrip and your familiar learns one common 1st-rank spell of your choice from your spell list.

SympatheticStrike.Note: Until the beginning of your next turn, the target takes a –1 circumstance penalty to its saves against your hexes, or a –2 penalty if the triggering Strike was a critical hit. @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.Item.qBTJYpopY3AwFFUJ]{Effect: Sympathetic Strike}

EldritchNails.RollOptionLabel: You hit the same enemy with two consecutive nail strikes

IronTeeth.Note: A creature that you critically hit with a jaws Strike must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.system.attributes.classDC.value)] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Indispuesto 1}.

ArcaneBond.DescriptionAddendum: Runelords hail from an era where even a scholar was expected to be able to defend themself with arms if necessary, leading to the practice of attaching a blade to the typical wizard's staff. You must choose a polearm or spear as your arcane bond. In place of an arcane thesis, you have a personal rune, which appears on your bonded weapon. The weapon functions as a staff with charges equal to the highest rank of spells you can cast and contains the sin spells from your sin up to that rank (including your cantrips). Your personal rune isn't a property rune and doesn't count against the weapon's limit of such runes. If you prepare a magical staff, it merges with your bonded item until your next daily preparations, adding its charges and spell list. While merged, the weapons haft takes on aesthetic aspects of the staff.
ArcaneBond.Label: Arcane Bond and Personal Rune

Sin.Prompt: Select a sin to specialize in.

Spellshape1.Prompt: Selecciona una dote de forma de hechizo de mago de primer nivel.

UnifiedMagicalTheory.Prompt: Selecciona una dote de mago de primer nivel.

ShieldingFormation.ResistanceToggle: Shielding Formation – End AC bonus to gain resistance

InescapableGrasp.Note: If you attempt to use a teleportation spell or effect to Escape, you must succeed at a @Check[flat|dc:15] or the spell fails.

Note.CriticalSuccess: The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 2} until the end of its next turn and then is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1} for 1 minute.
Note.Success: The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1} until the end of its next turn.

Strangle.FlatCheckNote: For an action requiring speech that is also a manipulate action, like Casting a Spell with the concentrate and manipulate trait, you just roll a single DC 10 flat check, rather than an additional DC 5 flat check for being grabbed.
Strangle.VerbalNote: You must succeed at a @Check[flat|dc:10] or lose any action that requires speech.

Note.CriticalSuccess: The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2} until the end of its next turn and then is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1} for 1 minute.
Note.Success: The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1} until the end of its next turn.

Suplex.Note: The target lands @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone} and you immediately release your hold on the target.

Text.Damage: Your spiritual power erupts to punish your enemies. You deal an additional 1d4 spirit damage with all Strikes and attack spells, and your Strikes and attack spells gain the spirit trait.
Text.Description: Once per day when you Unleash Yaoguai Might, you can gain one of the following additional benefits, which persists for 1 minute or until you Change Shape again.
Text.Enlarge: Your body grows to impossible heights. Your Enlarge effect is heightened to 4th rank.
Text.Fly: You can leap off the air itself. You gain the effects of the *fly* spell.
Text.Frequency: You can Unleash Yaoguai Might any number of times per day.
Text.Title: **Legendary Monster**

UnleashYaoguaiMight.BornOfAnimal: **Animal** Your hide thickens, granting a +1 circumstance bonus to AC.
UnleashYaoguaiMight.BornOfCelestial: **Celestial** You recover some of your celestial perfection, granting you and all allies within 15 feet a +1 status bonus to attack rolls.
UnleashYaoguaiMight.BornOfElements: **Elements** You're surrounded in wind and dust, granting concealment each round that you spend at least 1 action that has the move trait. You can't use this concealment to Hide or Sneak, as normal for sources of obvious concealment.
UnleashYaoguaiMight.BornOfItem: **Object** Your skin transmutes partially into an inorganic substance, granting resistance 5 to your choice of bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing.
UnleashYaoguaiMight.BornOfVegetation: **Vegetation** You trigger an accelerated growth, gaining fast healing 5.
UnleashYaoguaiMight.Description: As you enter your yaoguai form, you draw upon your internal magic to assume an even greater form. When you Change Shape to enter your yaoguai form, you can spend an additional action to gain the effects of Enlarge and an additional effect based on your heritage. This effect persists for 1 minute or until you Change Shape again.
UnleashYaoguaiMight.UsedMoveAction: Used action that has the move trait.

ChoiceSet.DragHomebrewItem: Arrastre un elemento casero aquí si usa uno en lugar de las opciones anteriores.

ViewItem.Disabled: La opción seleccionada no tiene hoja de artículo

EffectTarget.Prompt: Elige el objetivo de este efecto.

GrantItem.AlreadyHasItem: {actor} ya tiene {item} , por lo que no se ha vuelto a agregar.

Prompt.NoSelectionMade: No se realizó ninguna selección: {item} está inactivo.

TokenMark.TargetToken: Apunte a un token colocando el mouse sobre uno y presionando T. Presione Escape para cancelar.
TokenMark.Timeout: Creación de efectos cancelada por falta de objetivo.

RallyTheTroops.Prompt: Did the aeon guard end their movement adjacent to another aeon guard?

CoordinatedFire.Note: Your target becomes @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.enA7BxAjBb7ns1iF]{Suppressed} until the end of your next turn.

SeepIn.MaterialPrompt: Was the damage dealt by a weapon made of a special material?

LeadSalvo.RollOptionLabel: Lead Salvo — Additional number of d4s

RallyTheTroops.Prompt: Did your movement end next to the officer?

ConvergentEvolution.Prompt: Select a 5th-level or lower ancestry feat.

ManifoldEvolution.Prompt: Select a 17th-level or lower ancestry feat.

CairnForm.CriticalHit: The target must succeed at a @Check[fortitude|against:class] or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1} for 1 round.

PeerPressure.Label: Peer Pressure
PeerPressure.Note: Your psychic shock gains the arc trait, but it deals mental damage rather than electricity damage.

CutEmDeep.Note: When you successfully Demoralize the target of your @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.cmCtfURzpbzkxWsy]{Get 'Em!}, the target doesn't become immune to your further attempts to Demoralize them.

LeadByExample.DescriptionAlteration: When you use an act of leadership after issuing one or more envoy directives earlier that turn, you can choose one envoy directive you activated. You grant the lead by example benefits for that directive even if you didn't meet the usual requirements to lead by example. You can do this once per turn.

EffortlessInfluencer.Note:
When you succeed at a check with Deception, Diplomacy, or Intimidation, allies within 60 feet who witnessed your success gain a +1 status bonus to the next check they attempt with that skill within 1 minute (or a +2 bonus if your check was a critical success).

@UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feat-effects.Item.ZQM4vfHEKgxvNJik]{Effect: Effortless Influencer}

LeadByExample.ToggleLabel: Get Em! — Initial Lead by Example Strike

HangInThere.CriticalSuccess: The target gains temporary Hit Points equal to double their level plus your Charisma modifier. @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feat-effects.Item.B4JhFkbk5WHmWcOZ]{Effect: Hang In There!}
HangInThere.Success: The target gains temporary Hit Points their level plus your Charisma modifier. @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feat-effects.Item.B4JhFkbk5WHmWcOZ]{Effect: Hang In There!}

PardonMe.Note: When you successfully Tumble Through using Deception, the foe whose space you passed through is @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.enA7BxAjBb7ns1iF]{Suppressed} until the end of its next turn.

SavvyInfluencer.Note: The first time per day when you roll a natural 1 on a Deception, Diplomacy, or Intimidation check, you don't automatically reduce your degree of success (you get a critical failure only if your result is 10 lower than the DC).

SmoothDiversions.Failure: Creatures only become aware you were trying to trick them if you critically fail to Create a Diversion. Otherwise the creature assumes that your diversion was part of your regular bravado.
SmoothDiversions.Success: When you succeed at an attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.GkmbTGfg8KcgynOA]{Create a Diversion}, you can immediately @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.VMozDqMMuK5kpoX4]{Sneak} or Step as a free action.

TakeEmAlive.ToggleLabel: Take 'Em Alive — Add charisma to Strike damage

ForceField.Advanced: Attempt a @Check[flat|dc:19] check. On a success, the critical hit becomes a normal hit.
ForceField.Elite: Attempt a @Check[flat|dc:17] check. On a success, the critical hit becomes a normal hit.
ForceField.Paragon: Attempt a @Check[flat|dc:15] check. On a success, the critical hit becomes a normal hit.
ForceField.Superior: Attempt a @Check[flat|dc:18] check. On a success, the critical hit becomes a normal hit.
ForceField.Tactical: Attempt a @Check[flat|dc:20] check. On a success, the critical hit becomes a normal hit.
ForceField.Ultimate: Attempt a @Check[flat|dc:16] check. On a success, the critical hit becomes a normal hit.

Gluon.Note: On a critical hit, the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1} until it recovers from the persistent bleed damage.
Gluon.Title: Gluon Solarian Crystal

Note.Commercial: On a critical hit while you're graviton attuned, the target must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:23] save or be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} until the end of your next turn.

Tactical.CriticalHit: On a critical hit while you're graviton attuned, the target must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:31] save or be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} for 2 rounds.
Tactical.Hit: When you hit an @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} creature with your solar weapon while graviton attuned, the target must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:31] save or be knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}.

Note.Commercial: On a critical hit while you're photon attuned, the target must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:23] save or be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} for 1 round.
Note.Tactical: On a critical hit while you're photon attuned, the target must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:31] save or be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} for 2 rounds.

EntropicDestabilizer.Note: If the target has a shield raised, the shield takes the same amount of persistent damage (its wielder rolls the flat check to see if the persistent damage ends, or the GM rolls if the shield is no longer in someone's possession). Unlike normal void damage, the void damage from an entropic destabilizer damages objects, constructs, and the like by eroding them away.

FearProjector.CriticalNoteCommercial: When you critically hit with this weapon, the target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}.
FearProjector.CriticalNoteTactical: When you critically hit with this weapon, the target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 2}.

FrostModule.CriticalNoteCommercial: On a critical hit, the target is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} until the end of your next turn unless it succeeds at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:24] save.
FrostModule.CriticalNoteTactical: On a critical hit, the target is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} until the end of your next turn unless it succeeds at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:34] save.

HolyModule.CriticalNoteCommercial: On a critical hit, the target is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled} (or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} if unholy) until the end of your next turn unless it succeeds at a @Check[fortitude|dc:28] save.
HolyModule.CriticalNoteTactical: On a critical hit, the target is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled} (or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} if unholy) until the end of your next turn unless it succeeds at a @Check[fortitude|dc:35] save.

Loudener.CriticalNoteCommercial: On a critical hit, the target must succeed at a @Check[fortitude|dc:24] save or be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{Deafened} for 1 minute (or 1 hour on a critical failure).
Loudener.CriticalNoteTactical: On a critical hit, the target must succeed at a @Check[fortitude|dc:34] save or be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{Deafened} for 1 minute (or 1 hour on a critical failure).

ShockModule.CriticalNote: On a critical hit, electricity arcs out to deal an equal amount of electricity damage to up to two other creatures of your choice within 10 feet of the target.

Silencer.CriticalNoteTactical: On a critically successful Strike, the target becomes unable to make sound. The target can't use sonic attacks, nor can it use actions with the auditory trait. This also prevents the target from casting spells due to the incantations or sounds involved in casting, with the exception of subtle spells. The target can resist the effects of the silencer with a successful @Check[will|dc:27] save.

ScrappersIngenuity.Prompt: Was the device higher level than you?

ArcticBite.Note: Ignores an amount of the target's cold resistance equal to your level. A creature's immunities are unaffected.

ElectricKalo.Alteration: If you cast this spell with only 1 target, you gain electricity resistance equal to half your level (minimum 1) until the end of your next turn.

GelidBite.Note: On a critical hit, the target is also @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.enA7BxAjBb7ns1iF]{Suppressed} until the end of your next turn, unless it succeeds at a @Check[fortitude|against:class-spell] save against your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher.

Akashic.AdvancedEpiphany: You learn the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.z0Spgrf92nmaqjCW]{Akashic Assistant} focus spell.
Akashic.GreaterEpiphany: You learn the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.CjVOXjuvvTJqC7AD]{Data Drain} focus spell.
Akashic.Harmony: When you Transfer Vitality, the target receives a psychic download from the Akashic Record and can immediately attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.1OagaWtBpVXExToo]{Recall Knowledge} as a reaction. This doesn't trigger any special abilities, reactions, or free actions that trigger when a creature uses Recall Knowledge.
Akashic.InitialEpiphany: You learn the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.mAu69GVbFKYzQM5a]{Akashic Fount} focus spell.
Akashic.PerfectHarmony: You create an extradimensional memory palace that functions as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.vPWMEyVTreMOoFnm]. Creating a door to the demiplane takes 1 minute. The memory palace keeps the same layout each time you access it, adjustable during daily preparations. Each phantasmal minion in your memory palace functions as an akashic assistant (like those created by the *akashic assistant* spell).

Elemental.AdvancedEpiphany: You learn the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.5apI8Yamauo02VYR]{Elemental Barrier} epiphany spell.

ElementalBarrier.Air: Defending against electricity or sonic damage
ElementalBarrier.Earth: Defending against bludgeoning or piercing damage
ElementalBarrier.Metal: Defending against acid or slashing damage

Elemental.GreaterEpiphany: You learn the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.DZOjyZBZUrzkw5q2]{Elemental Nova} epiphany spell.

Harmony.Addendum: When you Transfer Vitality, choose an elemental trait: air, earth, fire, metal, water, or wood. If one or more of your elemental epiphanies are active, you must select the elemental trait you chose as part of casting those spells. Until the end of their next turn, the target's next Strike deals damage based on the chosen trait (your choice), rather than its typical damage type: electricity or sonic for air, bludgeoning or piercing for earth, acid or slashing for metal, fire for fire, bludgeoning or cold for water, or piercing or poison for wood.

Elemental.InitialEpiphany: You learn the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.d5dmu4HZ3YyrwcaF]{Elemental Weapon} epiphany spell.

PerfectHarmony.Addendum: When you heal a bonded ally with Transfer Vitality, your ally gains resistance equal to half your mystic level to the two damage types chosen during your daily preparations until the beginning of your next turn.

Healing.AdvancedEpiphany: You learn the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.zzi7LUKxKNWr5GsG]{Vitality Nova} focus spell.
Healing.GreaterEpiphany: You learn the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.MTulATAiOZfZNQ9d]{Vital Rebirth} focus spell.

Harmony.Addendum: When you Transfer Vitality, attempt to counteract one affliction affecting the target, or attempt to counteract one effect of your choice imposing one of the following conditions on the target: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{Deafened}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened}.

PerfectHarmony.AddendumCounteract: In addition, if you didn't counteract the effect, but you would've if its counteract rank were 2 lower, instead suppress the effect until the beginning of your next turn. The effect's duration doesn't elapse while it's suppressed.
PerfectHarmony.AddendumExpanded: When you Transfer Vitality, attempt to counteract one affliction affecting the target, or attempt to counteract one effect of your choice imposing one of the following conditions on the target: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{Deafened}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Doomed}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Paralyzed}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned}.

Rhythm.AdvancedEpiphany: You learn the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.AlYzxLKWZujnzsjJ]{Shuffle Repeat} focus spell.

Harmony.Addendum: When you Transfer Vitality, you can extend the duration of any active epiphany from the rhythm connection by 1 round.

PerfectHarmony.Addendum: The first time each round you Transfer Vitality, the target who regained Hit Points can Stride as a free action. This has the traversal trait.

Shadow.AdvancedEpiphany: You learn the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.rluzzX2ml4yFWnYw]{Cloying Shadows} focus spell.
Shadow.GreaterEpiphany: You learn the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.pgjlPNfXCpEYyLVu]{Shadow Prison} focus spell.

Harmony.Addendum: When you Transfer Vitality, the target's shadow darkens and swells, reducing bright light within a @Template[type:emanation|distance:10] of the target to dim light. This is a form of magical darkness and can overcome non-magical light sources or attempt to counteract magical light. The target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} while in this dim light and can use the concealed condition to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa]{Hide}. This lasts until the end of your next turn.

Shadow.InitialEpiphany: You learn the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.uh9Br4yrKvJA6zq0]{Shadow Snap} focus spell.

PerfectHarmony.Addendum: When you Transfer Vitality, the target can use @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.u9NU2bULHg3S5FaP]{Umbral Stride} once before the end of their next turn.

WasteNot.Addendum: Your vitality network gains @Damage[(2*@item.rank)[healing]] Hit Points.

DefensiveGunner.ToggleLabel: Defensive Gunner — Gun already has the parry trait.

EnhancedExploit.FreeActionNote: You can @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.qbyer2woEdGXZzoR]{Sabotage} as a free action whenever you critically hit a tech creature with a melee or ranged attack, targeting the triggering creature.
EnhancedExploit.ReactionNote: You can @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.qbyer2woEdGXZzoR]{Sabotage} as a reaction whenever a tech creature or a creature using a tech weapon critically fails a melee attack roll against you, targeting the triggering creature or weapon.

EnhancedExploit.Note: If you fail your first ranged Strike against your mark using a weapon in the sniper weapon group, you Reload your sniper weapon as a free action. The Strike doesn't count toward your multiple attack penalty.
EnhancedExploit.ToggleLabel: Enhanced Exploit — First ranged Strike against mark

Promession.Note: The target gets a result one degree of success worse than it rolled on its Fortitude save. @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spell-effects.Item.Mjzoqg7MpTst3koD]{Spell Effect: Promession}

ClingingBite.GrabAlteration: You can only use Grab following a successful critical hit with your jaws (rather than on a hit) or when you have a creature @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Restrained}.

AttunedWards.GravitonNote: The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} for 1 round. This increases to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 2} if this is the second time it hit you this turn.
AttunedWards.Label: Attuned Wards

HarmonicConvergence.Alteration: When you use an action with the disharmony trait, you gain a number of temporary Hit Points equal to half your level.

NimbusSurge.GravitonNote: If the Strike is a critical success, the target must succeed at a @Check[fortitude|against:solarian] save against your class DC or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1} until the end of its turn.
NimbusSurge.PhotonNote: If the Strike is a critical success, the target must succeed at a @Check[fortitude|against:solarian] save against your class DC or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1} until the start of its turn.

ShatteringImpact.GravitonNote: On a hit, the target takes a –10-foot status penalty to Speed until the start of your next turn. @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feat-effects.Item.Ll3uZdiSqaszP3fn]{Effect: Shattering Impact}

Graviton.Note: On a critical success, you can attempt a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{Trip} using your Athletics even if you don't have a free hand or are not adjacent to the target.
When you successfully Strike a creature using your solar weapon, that creature's space and all squares adjacent to it are difficult terrain for that creature until the end of its next turn.

GravitonAttuned.Label: Graviton-Attuned
GravitonAttuned.Note: When you successfully Strike a creature using your solar weapon, that creature treats all squares adjacent to the square where they were struck as being difficult terrain until the end of its next turn.

TwoHandToggle.Label: Solar Weapon — Use two hands
TwoHandToggle.TwinLabel: Twin Solar Weapon — Use two hands

StellarResilience.Note: When you roll a success on a Fortitude or Will save against a mental or incapacitation effect, you can @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.3xDhpvORBmK6AtcI]{Attune} as a free action.

ActionHero.AreaAddendum: When you Auto-Fire, the size of the cone is equal to the weapon's full range increment, rather than half.
ActionHero.PrimaryTargetAddendum: When using the Auto-Fire action, you can designate a target anywhere in the cone to be your primary target, rather than the creature closest to you.
ActionHero.RangedStrikeNote: When you successfully make a ranged Strike with an automatic weapon, you @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.enA7BxAjBb7ns1iF]{Suppress} the target until the start of your next turn.

ArmorStorm.Note: When you successfully Disarm, Grapple, Reposition, Shove, or Trip a creature, it becomes @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.enA7BxAjBb7ns1iF]{Suppressed} until the start of your next turn.

Bombard.Note: When you attack with an area weapon, you can select a number of allies within the area equal to half your Constitution modifier. The selected allies are unaffected by the attack. In addition, enemies who succeed (but not critically succeed) on their save against an area attack you make are still @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.enA7BxAjBb7ns1iF]{Suppressed} until the start of your next turn.

IntimidatingTaunt.Label: Intimidating Taunt
IntimidatingTaunt.SuccessAddendum: Only the first hostile action that the creature takes is affected.

SuppressingFire.Note: If you make an attack with a weapon that has the area trait, enemies in the affected area who fail their save against your attack become @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.enA7BxAjBb7ns1iF]{Suppressed} until the start of your next turn.

BoomingBootloader.Alteration: All creatures in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:10] around the creature you summoned take 1d4 sonic damage per spell rank (@Damage[((@item.level)d4)[sonic]]).

DebugSpell.Alteration: Any die you roll for damage that has a result lower than 2 becomes a result of 2 instead.

DeleteRootAccess.Alteration: Replace *delete's* target with "one construct or tech creature." Instead of delete's normal effects, the target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.9qGBRpbX9NEwtAAr] by you if its level is equal to or lower than your level – 3. It can attempt a Will saving throw to resist being controlled by you. If the target is already under someone else's command, the controlling creature also rolls a saving throw, and the construct uses the better result.

DegreeOfSuccess.CriticalFailure: **Critical Failure** As failure, but the duration is 1 hour.
DegreeOfSuccess.CriticalSuccess: **Critical Success** The target is unaffected and is temporarily immune for 24 hours.
DegreeOfSuccess.Failure: **Failure** The construct or tech creature becomes a minion under your control. The spell gains a duration of 1 minute, but it is dismissed if you or an ally attacks the construct or tech minion.

GrenadeSpell.Alteration: If your next action is to Cast a Spell with a burst effect that requires a Reflex save, the spell does not immediately take effect, but it instead is installed into the held grenade. Until the end of your next turn, any creatures caught in the Area Fire of the grenade are also affected by the installed spell; creatures do not make a separate Reflex save against the spell and instead use the same result they rolled against the grenade.

HardlightIllusion.Alteration: Creatures cannot attempt to disbelieve your illusion by merely touching or attempting to damage it, but they can still use the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Seek} action to examine it and attempt to disbelieve your illusion. When a creature succeeds (but not critically succeeds) at a Perception check or Will save to disbelieve the illusion, you can reprogram it as a reaction by attempting a Computers check against the target's Perception DC. If you succeed, the target fails to disbelieve the illusion.

OvervoltResistor.Alteration: The spell ignores an amount of the target's resistance to acid, cold, electricity, fire, or sonic damage equal to your level. This applies to all damage the spell deals, including persistent damage and damage caused by an ongoing effect of the spell, such as the wall created by wall of fire. A creature's immunities are unaffected.

ShatterSpell.Alteration: You successfully counteract the target, one creature of your choice occupying the same space as the spell effect or magic item takes force damage equal to 1d4 × the target's counteract rank with a basic Reflex save against your spell DC; if the target has a trait corresponding to a type of damage, such as fire, this effect deals that damage instead of force.

SignalBoost.Alteration: Increase the spell's range by 30 feet. As is standard for increasing spell ranges, if the spell normally has a range of touch, you extend its range to 30 feet.

SplitTunneling.Alteration: You can choose a second target within range. You roll a single attack roll and compare the result to the AC of both targets. This counts as one attack for your multiple attack penalty. To the second target, the spell deals only half the amount of damage it would normally deal for its degree of success, and it has no effects beyond the spell's initial damage (such as imposing conditions or penalties).

SudoSpell.Alteration: The spell's energy reverberates and echoes. You can Cast the Spell a second time before the end of your next turn without expending a spell slot.

AnchoringStrike.CriticalSuccess: The Strike gains the anchoring trait. You can reroll the damage dice rolled for this strike, but you must use the second result, even if it's worse.
AnchoringStrike.Success: The Strike gains the anchoring trait.

Analyst.QuantumField: You see and understand infinite possibilities and complex theoretical equations as clearly as though they were etched into your surroundings. When you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Seek} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.1OagaWtBpVXExToo]{Recall Knowledge}, you can apply the result against two related creatures, hazards, unattended objects, and effects in your quantum field. Whenever you sustain your quantum field, you can Seek or Recall Knowledge against an appropriate target in your quantum field as a free action.

Anomaly.QuantumField: Your movements blur as images of alternate iterations of you flicker around your current form, and your speech echoes with a chorus of otherworldly sounds. Any time an enemy within the quantum field attempts an action with the concentrate trait, the action is disrupted unless they succeed at a @Check[type:flat|dc:5].

GapInfluenced.QuantumField: Supernatural static swirls around you, making thoughts slippery for those unaccustomed to your presence. You are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} to creatures within your quantum field. When a creature within your quantum field hits you with an attack, you lose this benefit against that creature until the start of your next turn.

Precog.QuantumField: You have a modicum of control of the flow of time that surrounds you, allowing you to speed yourself and others up, or decrease the flow of time for others. An enemy creature that uses a move action inside your quantum field takes a –5-foot status penalty to its Speed during that action. You and your allies gain a +5-foot status bonus to Speed when you use a move action inside your quantum field during that action.

QuantumAnalysis.FortuneToggleLabel: Quantum Analysis — Attacking enemy within Quantum Field
QuantumAnalysis.Label: Quantum Analysis
QuantumAnalysis.Note: You ignore any flat check required due to the creature being @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden}, or behind cover.

QuantumField.AdjacentLabel: Inside or Adjacent to Your Quantum Field

ZoneOverlap.DebrisZone: Debris Zone becomes greater difficult terrain.
ZoneOverlap.RadiantZone: The zone overlap forces creatures to attempt another saving throw.
ZoneOverlap.TwistedDarkZone: Twisted Dark Zone ignores the temporary immunity of creatures that previously critically succeeded at the save for 1 round.
